channel.title: Why doesent the server warn
channel.description:
before it shuts down...
im mining and all of a sudden it just turns off... no warning... why!?

item.title: Why doesent the server warn
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:9, topic:406151”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=503147.msg3681766#msg3681766 date=1311572711]

Its not like you can just log back in in a few seconds and continue exactly where you left off
[/quote] my monsters in my trap disiper…

Like that matters since you were mining :rolleyes:

yes it does! becuase i dont mine to far from the trap and it fills it up

Bottom line is the server still is going to restart anyway so you will lose your mobs, anyways, whether it warns you or not.

so i can load my spawner with tnt and kill them all? and collect there stuff before a restart?[/quote]

it gives a 30 second warning and restarts every 6 hours right down the schedule

Read full topic

[/quote] my monsters in my trap disiper…

yes it does! becuase i dont mine to far from the trap and it fills it up

Bottom line is the server still is going to restart anyway so you will lose your mobs, anyways, whether it warns you or not.[/quote]
so i can load my spawner with tnt and kill them all? and collect there stuff before a restart?
